intro: Cynoglossum cyclhymenium, commonly known as the broadleaf forget-me-not, is a perennial herbaceous plant belonging to the Boraginaceae family. It is characterized by its basal rosette of broad, heart-shaped leaves and produces clusters of blue or violet flowers with five petals. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. It has hairy stems and is known for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal remedies. Cynoglossum cyclhymenium is also valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens.
